name: Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo

overview.title: One of the World's Largest Aquariums
overview.description: Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo is one of the largest suspended aquariums in the world. Located in The Dubai Mall, it features thousands of aquatic animals comprising over 140 species, including over 300 sharks and rays combined.

sections.title: Beneath The Sea
sections.subtitle: Unveiling Ocean Mysteries
sections.description: Add a stunning new dimension to your experience at Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo by entering the larger-than-life aquarium tunnel. Step into the diversity of the open ocean as you walk through this extraordinary 48-metre-long tunnel, 11 metres below the surface. Watch colourful fish dart between coral formations and witness rays glide gracefully overhead.

features.title: Walk Amongst Marine Life
features.description: Feel the magic as you become part of this underwater world, surrounded by a vibrant tapestry of fish and rays.

features.title: Witness the Feeding Frenzy
features.description: Witness a thrilling spectacle as skilled divers engage in feeding sessions with sharks and rays, offering a glimpse into their fascinating feeding behaviours.

features.title: Discover Tranquillity in the Deep
features.description: Immerse yourself in the peaceful ambiance of the tunnel. Escape the everyday as you observe the movements of the underwater world.

features.title: 360-Degree Ocean Views
features.description: Experience the wonder of being completely surrounded by marine life with our unique tunnel design offering panoramic underwater views.

sections.title: Aquatic Encounters
sections.subtitle: Journey Through Diverse Ecosystems
sections.description: Underwater Zoo showcases the spectacular diversity of life in our rivers and oceans through three distinct ecological zones – Rainforest, Rocky Shore and Living Ocean. Watch out for a vast array of aquatic animals across 40 individual displays:

ecosystems.title: Rainforest
ecosystems.description: Journey through lush vegetation where freshwater fish thrive alongside amphibians and reptiles. Piranhas, giant catfish, playful otters and water rats are just some of the animals you'll meet here.

ecosystems.title: Rocky Shore
ecosystems.description: Where land meets sea, experience rugged beauty where only the toughest survive. Reach out and touch some of the hardier rock pool inhabitants for a truly immersive experience.

ecosystems.title: Living Ocean
ecosystems.description: Venture into this underwater world where coral reefs shimmer and graceful sharks patrol the expanse.

ecosystems.title: Get Up Close and Personal
ecosystems.description: Get nose-to-nose with our incredible inhabitants including playful otters and mischievous penguins!

sections.title: Conservation & Education
sections.subtitle: Making Waves for Wildlife
sections.description: Join us in our mission to protect marine life through education and conservation. Our dedicated team works tirelessly to ensure the well-being of our 140+ species while contributing to global conservation efforts.

programs.title: Behind the Scenes Tours
programs.description: Go beyond the glass and discover what it takes to maintain one of the world's largest aquarium tanks. Learn about our state-of-the-art filtration systems and meet our passionate marine biologists.

programs.title: Educational Programs
programs.description: Engage with interactive workshops designed for all ages. From school field trips to specialized marine biology courses, we offer unique learning experiences that inspire the next generation of ocean advocates.

programs.title: Rescue & Rehabilitation
programs.description: Learn about our efforts to rescue and rehabilitate injured marine animals, preparing them for their return to the wild whenever possible.

programs.title: Research Initiatives
programs.description: Discover our ongoing research projects focused on marine conservation, breeding programs, and understanding ocean ecosystems to protect them for future generations.

sections.title: Unforgettable Experiences
sections.subtitle: Dive Into Adventure
sections.description: Take your visit to the next level with our exclusive experiences designed to bring you closer to marine life than ever before.

experiences.title: Shark Diving
experiences.description: For certified divers, experience the ultimate adrenaline rush swimming alongside our magnificent sharks in complete safety with our experienced dive masters.
experiences.requirements: PADI Open Water certification or equivalent

experiences.title: Cage Snorkeling
experiences.description: Not a certified diver? No problem! Our cage snorkeling experience lets you safely observe sharks and rays up close while floating at the surface.

experiences.title: Glass Bottom Boat
experiences.description: Glide across the surface of our main tank in our glass-bottom boat, offering a unique perspective of the underwater world below.

experiences.title: VR Zoo
experiences.description: Embark on a virtual reality journey to explore marine habitats from around the globe, coming face-to-face with creatures from the deepest oceans.

sections.title: Plan Your Visit
sections.subtitle: Making Memories That Last
sections.description: Everything you need to know to make the most of your visit to Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo.

information.title: Birthday Parties
information.description: Celebrate your special day surrounded by marine wonders with our customized birthday packages including exclusive tours, educational activities, and a dedicated party area with underwater views.

information.title: Annual Passes
benefits: Bring a friend free (once per month)

visitor_tips: Best time to visit is weekday mornings for smaller crowds
Feeding times offer the most active animal viewing
Book experiences in advance to avoid disappointment
Allow 2-3 hours for a complete visit
Combine with Dubai Mall shopping for a full day out
Download our mobile app for interactive maps and show times
awards: Best Family Attraction - Time Out Dubai 2022

interesting: Our 10-million litre tank is one of the largest suspended aquariums in the world
We're home to over 33,000 aquatic animals representing more than 140 species
The aquarium panel is 32.88 meters wide, 8.3 meters tall, and 750mm thick
Our King Croc weighs over 750kg and is over 40 years old
We feed our animals over 1,000kg of food every week
The aquarium tunnel provides a 270-degree view of marine life
Our oldest resident is a 80-year-old giant grouper
We've successfully bred over 20 species in captivity
records: Largest acrylic panel - Guinness World Records
Most diverse shark collection in the Middle East
First aquarium in the region with a 48-meter tunnel
